document.full_text: china's economic planning agency on monday published a new list of industries that it would encourage, restrict or ban, a blueprint that could have a far-reaching impact on investment activity china over the coming years.
document.title: china unveils new wanted, not-wanted industry list
lines_and_colors: china's economic planning agency on monday published a new list of industries that it would encourage, restrict or ban, a blueprint that could have a far-reaching impact on investment activity china over the coming years.
